description:
• Do you want to add 3D text and models to you videos?
  • Or maybe you want to make hollywood looking intros for your projects?
  • How about just adding a 3D logo for a client?
  • Did you tried to learn 3D animation and it was just too confusing?

If so, my course: 3D ProAnimator Unleashed - master 3d fundamentals is exactly what you need.

If you ever wanted to learn how to add 3d objects to you videos, or how to create cool looking 3d intro sequences you will love this course.

3D design is usually a very complex thing. Most softwares that create 3d are very expensive and have a very steep learning curve - that means it just takes so much time to learn them.

This is where Zaxwerks 3D ProAnimator comes into play.

Zaxwerks 3D ProAnimator for after effects is a plug-in that can generate 3D Text, Model Objects, Animate and do almost everything you can think about in After Effects.

In this course I will teach you how to unleash the power of Zaxwerks 3D ProAnimator:

  • How to create 3D Text with ease,
  • How to create Animations and use (or create) animation presets,
  • How to create 3D Logo's,
  • How to create Materials
  • How to use Lights,
  • How to work with Camera's,
  • and How to use Reflection Maps.

On top of all that you will also get all my project files and all the videos I used (that by itself usually costs more than the actual course). It will be just like you are sitting there with me and looking over my shoulder.

If you buy this course now, you will also get a125$ discount gift to buy this 3D ProAnimator software (the one we will be using in this course).

By the time you will finish this course, 3D Animation and Modelling will look like a piece of cake to you and you'll have all the tools to understand and create any type of 3D Animation you want.

So, if you ever thought 3D was too hard to learn, or just wanted to learn 3D and never had the time, take this course, get your coupon code for Zaxwerks 3D ProAnimator, download all the files I created for you, and learn to create Inspiring 3D Animations in After Effects.

i'll see you in the course.
title: Zaxwerks 3D ProAnimator Unleashed - Master 3D Fundamentals
